thread.title: Nick Gordon lost without Bobbi Kristina Brown
thread.title_full: Nick Gordon lost without Bobbi Kristina Brown

title: Nick Gordon lost without Bobbi Kristina Brown
text:
Nick Gordon 'lost' without Bobbi Kristina Brown 
Technology Industry News.Net (IANS) : Tuesday 1st September, 2015 
Baseball player Nick Gordon says he is "lost" without his late girlfriend Bobbi Kristina Brown, who tragically passed away in July after six months in a coma. 
The former boyfriend of the 22-year-old aspiring actress says he is struggling to cope without the late star in his life, reports femalefirst.co.uk. 
"I miss Bobbi Kristina so much it hurts. She was my everything in life and my best friend. I love her so much and I'm lost without her. I want her back and Whiteny (Whitney Houston) too I love u both so much r.i.p," Gordon wrote on Twitter. 
Gordon previously said he wanted to plan his own service for Kristina Brown after he was reportedly refused permission to attend her funeral. 
In a Facebook post, he wrote: "We will have our own service remembering and honouring Krissi. Only the real family that actually was there for her will attend." More Technology Industry News
